mapper.select: select id, role_name, role_key, role_sort, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from table_role where id = #{id}
select id, role_name, role_key, role_sort, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from myBlog.table_role where status != -1;
mapper.insert: insert into table_role(role_name, role_key, role_sort, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values (#{roleName}, #{roleKey}, #{roleSort}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark})

insert into table_role(role_name, role_key, role_sort, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values
(#{entity.roleName}, #{entity.roleKey}, #{entity.roleSort}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remark})

insert into table_role(role_name, role_key, role_sort, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values
(#{entity.roleName}, #{entity.roleKey}, #{entity.roleSort}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remark})
on duplicate key update role_name = values(role_name), role_key = values(role_key), role_sort = values(role_sort), status = values(status), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), remark = values(remark)
mapper.update:
update table_role
role_name = #{roleName},
role_key = #{roleKey},
role_sort = #{roleSort},
status = #{status},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remark = #{remark},
where id = #{id}
